blogs.title: Super Mario Odessy
blogs.author: Shigeru Miyamoto
blogs.detail: Certainly, Super Mario Odyssey is a video game where Mario must rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, who plans to marry her. Mario travels through various kingdoms using his hat-shaped friend, Cappy, to possess objects and enemies to aid him in his quest. The game is known for its platforming and exploration elements.

blogs.title: Metal Gear Solid V : The Phantom Pain
blogs.author: Hideo Kajima
blogs.detail: Certainly, Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain follows Big Boss on a quest for revenge against those who betrayed him, all while dealing with a mysterious enemy known as Skull Face and the development of advanced military technology.

blogs.title: Naruto: Ninja Storm 5
blogs.author: Masashi Kishimoto
blogs.detail: Certainly, Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 follows Naruto and his friends as they battle powerful foes, including Kaguya and Madara, to save the world from destruction and bring peace to the ninja world.
